      • getByWorkItemsAndFields

        java.util.List<TFieldChangeBean> getByWorkItemsAndFields(int[] workItemIDs,
                                                       java.lang.Integer[] fieldIDs,
                                                       boolean includeField,
                                                       java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> personIDs,
                                                       java.util.Date fromDate,
                                                       java.util.Date toDate)
        Get the FieldChanges for an workItem
        Parameters:
        workItemIDs - if not null or empty filter also by workItemIDs, otherwise neglect this parameter
        fieldIDs - if not null filter also by fieldID, otherwise neglect this parameter
        includeField: - relevant only if fieldID not null: if true include this field, if false exclude this field
        personIDs - if not null or empty filter also by personIDs, otherwise neglect this parameter
        fromDate - if specified after this date
        toDate - if specified before this date
        Returns:
